title: Admissions Open for 2026
content:
Siyabulela S.S.S. is pleased to announce that applications are now open for learners entering Grades 8â€“11 in 2026.


Application forms available: 22 July 2025
Closing date: 25 September 2025

Extended closing date: 15 October 2025

All applicants who submit forms are required to attend the assessment session on 06 September 2025. Learners must be seated in the school hall by the communicated time.

Regards; 
Management.
